articles.content: PARIS, Oct 14 (Reuters) - French food company Danone (DANO.PA) said on Friday it would shed its dairy food business in Russia in a deal that could lead to a write-off of up to 1 billion euro ($978 mi… [+1168 chars]

articles.title: Retirement dreams become nightmares for many older Americans as inflation soars
articles.description: Too many Americans have to make a choice between putting food on the table and saving for retirement.
articles.content:
• Social Security recipients are expected to receive an 8.7% cost-of-living increase, the biggest in four decades.

articles.author: Deep Shukla
articles.title: Ultra-processed foods: Could what a mother eats affect a child's obesity risk?
articles.description: A mother's consumption of ultra-processed foods such as packaged bread, and sweetened beverages may be linked to an increased risk of obesity in children, a study suggests.
articles.content:
• Ultra-processed foods are those that have undergone significant levels of industrial processing and modification during preparation and contain only small amounts of whole foods, if any.
